thread.title: Epcot Food & Wine Fest: New menu items for 2015
thread.title_full: Epcot Food & Wine Fest: New menu items for 2015

author: Matt Mauney
title: Epcot Food & Wine Fest: New menu items for 2015
text:
Epcot Food & Wine Fest: New menu items for 2015 New dishes Joe Burbank, Orlando Sentinel 
The seared venison loin with wild mushroom marsala sauce and kumara dumpling at the New Zealand pavilion is one of 29 new dishes at the 2015 Epcot International Food and Wine Festival. 
The seared venison loin with wild mushroom marsala sauce and kumara dumpling at the New Zealand pavilion is one of 29 new dishes at the 2015 Epcot International Food and Wine Festival. (Joe Burbank, Orlando Sentinel) Wines A complete list of new and returning menu items to the Epcot International Food & Wine Festival 
There are 29 new menu items at the 20th Epcot International Food & Wine Festival, along with plenty of favorites making a return in 2015. 
The Dominican Republic pavilion features the most new dishes with four, while Patagonia, Italy, Belgium and Ireland don't have any new offerings. Complete 2015 Epcot International Food & Wine Festival coverage Read more stories 
With the stars of ABC's "The Chew" joining the festival lineup , the "Sustainable Chew Marketplace" will debut, featuring dishes like pork spareribs, ricotta and zucchini ravioli and vanilla panna cotta with fresh figs and pistachio brittle. The festival runs from Sept. 25-Nov. 16. 
View the full list of new and returning food below. 
Scotland 
- Haggis with Neeps and Tatties: Traditional Haggis with Rutabaga and Mashed Potatoes - The Tipsy Laird: Whiskey-soaked Cake with Lemon Cream and Toasted Oats 
Farm Fresh 
- Loaded Mac n' Cheese with Nueske's Pepper Bacon, Cheddar Cheese, Peppers, and Green Onions 
New Zealand 
- Seared Venison Loin with Wild Mushroom Marsala Sauce and Kumara Dumpling 
Australia
